Lee Yoonjeong

Native name:
이윤정
Group (1995-1997):
Se Se Se until Jan 1, 1996

Introduction

Lee Yoonjeong was one of the original members of Se Se Se but left in 1996 due to complications with her company.

May 1, 1995
